foreignData.flavorText: „Atme das Leben ein. Atme den Schmerz aus." —Älterer Mystiker
foreignData.name: Keine Beachtung schenken
foreignData.text: Verhindere allen Schaden, den eine Quelle, die du bestimmst, in diesem Zug zufügen würde.

foreignData.name: Hacer caso omiso
foreignData.text: Prevén todo el daño que fuera a hacer una fuente de tu elección este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Inhalez la vie. Exhalez la douleur. » —Un doyen des mystiques.
foreignData.name: Sans tenir compte
foreignData.text: Prévenez toutes les blessures qu'une source de votre choix devrait infliger ce tour-ci.

foreignData.name: Ignorare
foreignData.text: Previeni tutto il danno che una fonte a tua scelta infliggerebbe in questo turno.

foreignData.name: Desconsiderar
foreignData.text: Previne todo o dano que uma fonte a sua escolha fosse causar neste turno.

name: Pay No Heed
originalText: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

rulings.text: Pay No Heed doesn’t target anything. You can choose a source with hexproof, for example. You choose the damage source as Pay No Heed resolves.
If the chosen source is a permanent spell, damage dealt later in the turn by the permanent it becomes will also be prevented.

text: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
